title: Leezen - Taichung Port Road
description: Part of an all vegetarian health food chain with many locations throughout Taiwan. Founded by a Buddhist organization with emphasis on organic, natural, and vegetarian. Most items are vegan, some with dairy. This location is quite large and well stocked with a range of dried food products and snacks as well as a refrigerated case and organic underwear. Upstairs is a casual vegetarian restaurant where you can lounge and get a meal. Located across the street and down a little from the Evergreen Laurel Hotel.
streetAddress: 3, Sec. 2, Chung Kang Road (Taichung Port Road)
